name: 3D Runner (itch) (Splash Studios)
description:
You are a cube  like any parkour game you have to jump past all the platforms but  you move very fast.

all you need to play is a keyboard and I recommended to use a mouse but you don't have to. 

CONTROLS:

1 .Space bar to jump.

Yep that's it

Donations are much appreciated.

The Windows download link should also work for Mac.

NON  of my games are by Spalsh-Studios.com & this is not at all related to 3D runner on the google play store.
